[E009] Error: standalone type `never` cannot be nullable
   ,-[code.php:4:13]
   |
 4 |     public ?never $s;
   *            |^^|^^  
   *            `------- try removing this
   *               |    
   *               `---- `never` used here
   * 
   * Note: `never`, `void`, and `mixed` cannot be nullable
---'
